net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Class CmsRequestContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.CmsRequestContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, CmsRequestListener

    public class CmsRequestContext
extends Object
implements CmsRequestListener
    Context information for a CMS request. This information is available for the life of a request/response cycle. This class was created for integration with non-CMS aware frameworks.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • getClassPath

        public static String getClassPath()
        Get the classpath of the web application.
        Returns:
        the classpath or empty string if it could not be determined.

      • getDependencies

        public List<Class<? extends CmsRequestListener>> getDependencies()
        Description copied from interface: CmsRequestListener
        Get the listeners this listener depends on being fired before this listener is fired when initializing. The reserve order is used when destroyed the request.
        Specified by:
        getDependencies in interface CmsRequestListener
        Returns:
        List.

      • getHostname

        public static CmsHostname getHostname()
                               throws IllegalStateException
        Get the current hostname.
        Returns:
        the hostname or null if the request isn't for a valid hostname.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.
        See Also:
        isInRequestResponseCycle()

      • getLocaleContext

        public static net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocaleContext getLocaleContext()
        Get the current locale context. This may return a different LocaleContext than CmsRequest.getLocaleContext().
        Returns:
        the locale context.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.

      • getMethod

        public static String getMethod()
                        throws IllegalStateException
        Get the method of the request.
        Returns:
        the method. One of "get" or "post" (may be mixed/upper/lower case).
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.
        See Also:
        isInRequestResponseCycle()

      • getOriginalRequestURL

        public static String getOriginalRequestURL()
                                    throws IllegalStateException
        Get the original URI request. This may be different than the current URI, if a different page is being processed due to error handling.
        Returns:
        the uri or null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.
        See Also:
        isInRequestResponseCycle(), getRequestError()

      • getRemoteIPAddress

        public static String getRemoteIPAddress()
                                 throws IllegalStateException

        Returns:
        the IP Address or null if unknown.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.
        See Also:
        isInRequestResponseCycle()

        Returns:
        the orror or null if the request is not in error.
        Throws:

      • isInRequestResponseCycle

        public static boolean isInRequestResponseCycle()
        Return true if currently in a request/response cycle; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if processing a request.

      • isRendering

        public static boolean isRendering()
        Test if CMS is currently rendering content.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • isRequestForXmlContent

        public static boolean isRequestForXmlContent()
        Return true if the request is for XML content.
        Returns:
        true or false.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.

      • isRequestInError

        public static boolean isRequestInError()
                                throws IllegalStateException
        Check if the current request being processed is due to an error
        Returns:
        true or false.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.
        See Also:
        isInRequestResponseCycle()

        public static boolean isRequestSecure()
                               throws IllegalStateException

        Returns:
        true or false.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if not in a request response cycle.
        See Also:
